env.name: REPO_OR_ORG
env.label: Repository or organization of the runner
env.description: The repository or organization you want your runner to connect to

env.name: PAT
env.label: Personal Access Token for connection
env.description: The Personal Access Token use by the runner to connect to GitHub

env.name: RUNNER_NAME
env.label: Name of the runner (appears in GitHub settings)
env.description: The name of the runner as it appears in the action settings on GitHub. Will be 'self-hosted' if left empty
